titleStmt.title: The genteel companion being exact directions for the recorder : with a collection of the best and newest tunes and grounds extant / carefully composed and gathered by Humphry Salter.
titleStmt.author: Salter, Humphrey.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Hunt and Humphry Salter at the Lute in St. Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Includes "Directions for the recorder" on 8 p. and [50] p. of music.
Reproduction of original in: Library of Congress.
